footer.title: Let’s talk about your next project ! 🚀

about.title: Who am I?
about.description:
Hi 👋 ! I’m Matteo, a FullStack developer for {{yearsExperience}} years.

Originally set on becoming an architect, my passion for web development emerged during the lockdown, reinforced by a Bachelor’s degree at the IIM and a Master’s at HETIC. 💻

It all started with OpenClassrooms. The first site you turn to when you’re interested in the web!

Currently freelancing, I have experience creating multiple projects. 🚀

My rigor, perseverance, and aesthetic sensitivity are reflected in my vision of development.

“Clean code is worth 10” 😉
